website_summaries.verdict: Dogs typically love the taste of these all-natural treats made from the skins of cod.
pros: All skins are sourced from wild-caught Alaskan cod
These skins are processed in the United States, so you can trust the quality you'll receive
Provides a desirable level of protein for the animal, which helps with hunger
Treat is safe for both cats and dogs in multi-pet homes
cons: A little pricier per ounce than some other dehydrated dog treats

website_summaries.verdict: A healthy chip-like snack that's sure to be a favorite among cats and dogs alike.
pros: Crispy fish skins are a healthy source of protein
Similar in texture to a potato chip
Treats are a huge favorite among dogs as well as cats
Only one ingredient means you can feel safe treating your cat to this snack
cons: Strong fish scent lingers on your cat's breath for hours after eating

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog with sensitive stomach
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a very sensitive stomach and so it is not unusual for us to buy several different brands of treats to find one that will actually not upset his stomach. I initially got these as a present for him for Christmas and I will say that these are absolutely fantastic treats for my dog. In the past year since he has been only getting these treat we have had no digestive issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Dbags

customer_reviews.title: No chewing action but dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: Good healthy snack which my dog enjoys. I've also gotten Beams by Honest Kitchen, which I prefer as they offer chewing time (they're much harder and thicker - these are kind of crumbly). I don't know if it's because of using different fish or a different manufacturing process. For a little dog these might be more of a chew and could easily be broken into pieces (they're quite long). Beams have to be cut apart with scissors if you want a smaller piece. Quality is good though and I'd rather give something like this as a quick treat than give her cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: terrier love these. Received them yesterday
customer_reviews.text: Both my chihuahua and my terrorist, er, terrier love these. Received them yesterday, opened the tube and I was almost run over by the dogs! The pieces are long, so I broke one into 1/3 & 2/3 pieces. Zipper the terrier got 2/3 and Max the chihuahua got the 1/3. Little crumbs get everywhere. The Zip was a stinker and took his to my bed to eat - wish I'd known that's what he was doing....
customer_reviews.author: A. meyer

customer_reviews.title: Pup love them!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy these one piece at a time at the pet store but thought these would be a better bargain. Albeit, they are $.99 cents a piece at the store and they seem to be thicker and not quite so crunchy and last a bit longer than the Polkadog Bakery brand however, that being said our chihuahua loves these and more than likely will be purchasing them again. As long as she is happy! I will say they come in a long plastic tube can and they are about 12 inches log, only a few were broken but that doesn't matter. They are stinky and that is just the way our girl loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Jackson-Boone

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes fish skins but not these.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was nice and fun. Product came quickly. Product was sealed. I purchased these fish skins because my min pin went crazy for one we got her at a local dog boutique. Knowing this we decided to find some online and order. WE got these promptly, they had a nice strong oder which I thought she would love. I think the problem is they are to hard. They are much harder than the one we got from the dog store. Unfortunately there is no way you can return if your dog doesn't like. Now I am out $$ and left with a pack of stinky fish skins. :(
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Broken tube
customer_reviews.text: So my dogs loved these. I even gave them to friend's dogs as well and they loved them. They're a bit expensive (I literally ran through them in about a day or two, but that's my own fault for giving some away) But good quality. I would recommend buying a bigger bag though for value. My only issue is my tube came broken. So I had to exchange the tube for a ziplock bag when I got it... it was a bit worrisome but the quality of the actual fish skins were fine and there was no broken plastic in the box so I assume they put it in my box already broken...which is NOT good.
customer_reviews.author: Taira A Cangro

customer_reviews.title: German Shepherd goes nuts for these
customer_reviews.text: German Shepherd on special diet most of his life is nuts for these. My only complaint is that they need to secure the top of the container on better because twice they've arrived with the top popped off. I'm not sure at what point the top comes off. they are really good size. For smaller dogs you could even break it in half.
customer_reviews.author: e. white

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Our little Buddy couldn't be happier. He loves the fish skin treats but a lot of them are WAY too hard for him to eat (14lb Lhasa Apso) or weirdly shaped and thus hard for him to eat. These are perfect! Each one makes three good-sized treats and he still has to spend a little time with it so he is totally satisfied when he's finished. I also love that these are made in the USA. But mostly love how my Buddy freaks out over these things. LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for a year or more & they use to be thick & nice size but the last couple of containers I got have been as thin as my little finger actually thinner & my dog doesn't seem to like them as much as before...been very disappointed in them because my dog use to love these more then other treats.
customer_reviews.author: ann graver

customer_reviews.title: Oskar loves 'em
customer_reviews.text: So, I have a cat who thinks he's a dog (not uncommon). He's a year old and CHEWS voraciously. Feet under covers especially. So I've been buying something like this at a pet store for $2/per 8' stick. These are a bit better value. They are more crunchy than the pet store variety, and at first, Oskar didn't like them. Once he tried it when he was hungry, he loved it! I give him a 3" piece every morning. No ill effects, and his coat is silky. Glad I found these! I will buy the BIG bag next time.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: My mini goldendoodle adores these crunchy cod skins. She eats one up in a skinny minute so they aren't a long-lasting treat but they're so good for her and she loves them so much that I keep buying them for her. Fishy smell, as you would expect, and could potentially be a little messy but my dog hoovers up every last bit. She gets around one a day as a special treat. I really love Polkadog treats for being simple but nutritious and tasty and because they are made in the US from US-sourced ingredients. Our other favorite Polkadog treat is the Chicken LIttles, crunchy little bites made from three ingredients that are great for toy-stuffing. Great company!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Krusenstjerna

customer_reviews.title: My dog is crazy for these!
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal, actual dried fish skins and they smell like it! Not so great for me, but perfect for my dog. I only get these occasionally, as they are pricey, but when I do my dog goes over to the closet and stares at where they are because she loves them so much! Highly recommend for a treat. Came in perfect condition with none broken.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P

customer_reviews.title: All 3 dogs LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: We used to purchase these regularly at a doggie day care center where we had sent one of our dogs. Then we moved out of the area for 2 years...saw these on-line so ordered them there and voila! All 3 of our dogs absolutely love them! This is a big deal because normally only 1 or 2 of our pets like any given treat. Makes our lives MUCH easier when all 3 go for something. They are super healthy because they are the real deal: dried fish skins, nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Roxanne Yahner, DACM, L.Ac., M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs skin problems
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product. I bought it for a dog that has really bad skin problems for the OMGA3 in it. I opened the package and she took it and ate it in about a minute. I also have a Yorkie puppy to whom I gave a half of one to. She's still working on hers. She is 8 weeks old. I will update if I feel this has helped with the 1 yr olds skin problems..
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: My pups love these!
customer_reviews.text: I get these for my dogs as special treats because one has allergies to a lot of meats but can eat fish fine. All three dogs go nuts for these crunchy snacks. Warning, they smell AWFUL. I dont even open the container inside. It's definitely an outside treat both because of the smell and the crumbs it leaves behind. Kind of a mess, but they just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good for cats and dogs
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these in a little boutique shop in Arizona so I was thrilled to see them on Amazon. The price does fluctuate so I try to buy them when they are $11 or $12. They will last if you break them up into more bite sized pieces. I have also given them to my cats and they dig them too. I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: JMIce

customer_reviews.title: Picky, old dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: Our Jackahuahua is super picky about food and treats but she loves these dang things. She can munch 1/2 a stick in less than 5 minutes. They are crunchy...so I figure they are good for her teeth. And lots of fish oil in skins....so they must be good for her coat and joints too. We must always now have at least half a jar in storage.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Mccormack

customer_reviews.title: Fun treat for a dog (and a cat!)
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves them! At first she was not sure they were a treat, but after a little encouragement she tried it and loved it. Happily it does not have a strong fish smell. My cat also loves it as I found him begging when I got it out for the dog. I would never buy this for a cat since it is so large, but he appreciates having some broken off for him. So you can totally let a cat share this.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: My picky eater gobbles these healthy treats down, like candy!
customer_reviews.text: My picky little Wire Hair Fox Terrier LOVES these. I really like the idea of giving her something she loves that is rich in omegas for her skin, coat and eye health. They last a bit, as I snap about a third at a time off for her. She happily gobbles it down. Happy pup, happy pup mama!
customer_reviews.author: JillianTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I received these today. Immediately, I noticed they were broken to pieces. These have a VERY strong fishy smell. Among the very few unbroken sticks, all of them were thin. About the consistency of a potato chip. My lab made short work of it. Appx 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Cruentis

customer_reviews.title: Must be bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I feed my dogs dried cod skins all of the time, and mostly buy through a reputable pet store. During this pandemic, I decided to purchase these online however, I've never purchased this brand before. After eating 1/2 one of these, my dogs had awful poos. I threw the rest of them out. Will stay with my other brand, Icelandic+.
customer_reviews.author: luv2ski&surf

customer_reviews.title: Great nutritious snack
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these things. These cod skins aren't a chew - I consider them a healthy snack. My corgis eat them in no time flat. They're easy to break into smaller pieces, and I give my boys half a stick each. Only one pet store in my area sells them & doesn't always have them in stock. So, I was happy to find the cod skin sticks on Amazon. They're actually a little cheaper here than they are at the local store.
customer_reviews.author: NinaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Be careful and supervise your dog.
customer_reviews.text: Depending on your dog will determine the safety of the treat. Cats don’t really care for it. Dogs seem to go crazy over it. Smells awful but it is 100% cod! So obviously. My brothers dogs were able to enjoy these dry cod skin sticks safely. My best friends dog got overly excited and tried to eat it whole. Chocked and bled a bit. But she’s okay. Just be sure to cut up and watch over your dog when giving this treat to them. Other than that. It’s a great treat which the dogs will absolutely love!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Licata

customer_reviews.title: Because the MOST FUN THING HAPPENS
customer_reviews.text: My Samoyed puppy LOVES these!!!! So crunchy! We are using this to train her to come to us off leash when called. Because the MOST FUN THING HAPPENS! haha. These are awesome. Thank you, Polka Dog Bakery!
customer_reviews.author: KC E.

customer_reviews.title: Made both dogs very sick
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are used to eating fish and a wide variety of dried, fresh and canned food. But when I gave them each one of these they both got tremendously sick with explosive diarrhea. I wasted a lot of money. I am too afraid to try again.
customer_reviews.author: LMB

customer_reviews.title: My dogs' favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: These treats are not meant to last long. The dogs will eat them very fast, but they will enjoy them immensely. Even my 13 year old with few teeth left can have them if I break them up into tiny pieces for her. They do smell fishy, but what do you expect? LOL
customer_reviews.author: Sparklepony

customer_reviews.title: MADE AND SOURCED IN THE USA!
customer_reviews.text: These Cod Sticks are great. My little 6 pound dog loves them. The best thing about them is they are Sourced and MADE in the USA! ( be ware of other companies that source in US but make in China) I am very impressed with is Company. The Sticks are crunchy but not to hard. They are not smelly at all.
customer_reviews.author: Deb S

customer_reviews.title: Some pieces are very hard and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed by the quality. Some pieces were so hard that breaking them cut my hand and made me bleed. My dog also had difficulty chewing the very hard pieces unless they are soaked in water.
customer_reviews.author: Little Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Like potato chips for dogs. Crunchy, not chewy.
customer_reviews.text: These are like healthy potato chips for dogs. Crunchy but don't last but a few seconds for a medium sized dog (50 pounds). Don't confuse them with fish skin chews. When they say crunchy, they mean it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Just the Facts

customer_reviews.title: I feel good giving it to them
customer_reviews.text: Our little babies love the skins. I put them in the freezer and take one out break it in half for each of them they know what a Scooby snack is and they love it and it’s good for them I have bought this several times and never been disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jersey girl

customer_reviews.title: Apparently very delicious!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these cod skins! They’re not as long as the cod skins I get from my dog store I go to but they are just as tasty according to my dog. You should see the look on my dog’s face when I get this jar out and the salivation and hopping up and down starts. My dog says that this is a VERY good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy M

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs love these! They are a bit expensive, so I have started sticking them in a treat toy to slow them down some. They have more give to them so I worry a lot less about choking than I do with bully sticks or Himalayan Yak cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: My dog approves
customer_reviews.text: I always attempt to keep my dog's diet as simple as possible with food and treats that have limited AND recognizable ingredients. Can't get much simpler than ONE ingredient. She loves them so that is a ten star rating in my book !
customer_reviews.author: EyeLoveGlassesTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Very fishy smell, my small dogs chew it without danger of chocking, since it’s a medium crunch, tried other brands but were to hard, these I can break up using my hands only, best of all not sourced in China, do recommend
customer_reviews.author: HMM

customer_reviews.title: Poochie loves them more than me
customer_reviews.text: These are good, my dog goes bonkers for them. I don’t love how messy they are and they are so super long which I find kind of an impractical size. And then the container is super tall so hard to store. However my dog gives them two paws up!!!
customer_reviews.author: daintysteppin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Opened
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but it arrived opened. Product broken all over the box and I am afraid not safe to give to dog. Amazon no help.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Maule

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fish skin
customer_reviews.text: This crunchy fishy treat is my Akitas favorite snack. Initially was unsure of how he would react, but once he got a taste he got to work. Lasted longer than I expected, but still basically fish skin jerky. There will always be a container of this in the pups pantry.
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: Tasty & healthy treat!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent source of protein and a great snack for our little pup. She loves these fish skins. While there are a many other types of fish skins available via Amazon, these are the ones SHE LOVES, absolutely loves!!
customer_reviews.author: Treelah Y

customer_reviews.title: Smelly, but My Dogs Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My tube came with about 10-12 cod sticks which are about 12 inches each. I was surprised at how brittle the cod sticks are, but this makes them very easy to break up into feedable chunks. This is not a chewy treat, and should only be given under supervision given how easy the treats shatter. In terms of the odor, they do smell strongly of fish, but the smell disappears pretty soon after the treat is consumed. My picky eater loves them, so I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Smells like fish but my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is my dogs favorite treat. He's only got 6 teeth (senior yorkie) so there are a lot of treats he can't handle. Not this one, though. He gets so excited for his cod!
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Nutritional Treat for Fur Babies❤️
customer_reviews.text: I think they’re stinky (smell just like fish), but our Westie girl loves them! So glad I found them mentioned on twitter from a user who purchases them for their doggies.
customer_reviews.author: pyr8grl

customer_reviews.title: Stinky Love
customer_reviews.text: These are my dog's favorite treats. They do smell, but the container seems to keep the smell trapped inside, so it's not really a problem. My dog is small, so I break them into thirds and he plows through it in just a minute or two.
customer_reviews.author: KristinM

customer_reviews.title: Puppers love it!
customer_reviews.text: I found this amazing product by chance when looking for healthier treats for my dogs. Got to try it and now it is a regular at our home. My younger dog is a bit picky to eat and I sprinkle half of a stick and food is all gone! highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Litsi

customer_reviews.title: Best treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely lives for these and we cannot wait to give them to him. 1/2 a skin per night and he crunches it up like it’s meat! Greatest product ever.
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love 'em, needs better packaging
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these things, but I've ordered two packages now where they show up with the package open and taped back shut. If this was food for yourself, would you eat it? For the price, it would be nice to know that someone hadn't tampered with my dog's food. Recyclable package would be great too.
customer_reviews.author: N. Domitrovich

customer_reviews.title: GSP Approved
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are obsessed with these. I won't give my dogs bones or other chews that could choke them because I have anxiety about it so these are perfect. They are super crunchy and a perfect treat for my two GSPs.
customer_reviews.author: Asav88

customer_reviews.title: Short... Very Short
customer_reviews.text: If I miss read the description of the size of these things these then that’s on me. German Shepherd goes crazy for them. The sticks are the size of a 20 oz tumbler (eh maybe add a few more inches)
customer_reviews.author: VBizarro07

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a very picky eater and almost always refuses treats - except for these. Polka Dog Cod Skins are a high quality product and a nice, natural change of pace from typical, cookie-cutter processed treats. They make an excellent substitute for raw hide/bone-based pet products (no odor, no choke hazard, no slimy mess) and are easy on his teeth. If you really want to spoil your best buddy, these are truly top notch! I honestly do not bother buying my boy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Tupper

customer_reviews.title: Cat hate
customer_reviews.text: Sadly my cat hates these.... ignored them even when I try to offer them at times they should be starving
customer_reviews.author: student

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I was truly surprised by the 14 in tall can the skins arrived in, they are a bit pricey but OMG the dogs love them! Buy a can and keep them as a special treat. They are easily broken into any size piece you would like which makes them very manageable. I will definitely be a repeat buyer!
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treat
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I should be writing this review as I am not the one that eats these. However, the way my dogs act whenever I open the container indicates to me that they must be good. I am always careful about what I feed my dogs but I have complete confidence in this product. Only negative is that my dogs breath stink of fish for a while after, to be expected, yes?
customer_reviews.author: Westlain

customer_reviews.title: The doggies love these!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this as a single treat at a boutique pet store to see if my dog liked them. Well, she and her dog buddies love these treats. Her buddy has chronic pancreatitis, so I look for low fat treats that they both enjoy. This fits the bill, so I ordered 2 in this size. They like them so much I re-ordered the larger 2lb bag as recommended by another reviewer and just refill the container shown here. It is more economical, but it is a large bag, so make sure you have room to store.
customer_reviews.author: Mystina

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes crazy when she sees the container come out! They can easily be broken into smaller pieces to save on calorie count. A little fishy smell, but my dog's reaction far outweighs the smell. I also notice that my dog's coat is silky smooth, and I think this helps with that.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes these. Just don't cut them into too ...
customer_reviews.text: Dog likes these. Just don't cut them into too small of pieces as they can become lodged or dog may try to eat them too quick and since they are dry will start coughing as mine did. I wish they came in a bit smaller size though as when I do cut them at all, since they are dry, they end up leaving crumbly bits/crumbs everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tirepetter

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these crunchy snacks. I break them up because they are big and she isn’t! These are one of her faves.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: Two paws up!
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES these. She has a very finicky stomach and has allergies. She’s able to eat these without the stomach upset that bully sticks give her.
customer_reviews.author: Pit Bull Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These fish skin are big compared with what I can get a Hollywood feed and it’s less costly. I would differently by again
customer_reviews.author: Q. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: My pup goes crazy over these!
customer_reviews.text: The local pet shop near my old house sells these and my dog went crazy for them the first time he got a sample at the shop. These are his favorite treats and I can always get him to stop doing something bad if I just mention "cod skins". I've been thinking of purchasing the pound bag Amazon sells, but I love how hear come in a cylindrical tube, so they don't break as easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them. They are long but not thick or chewey. Great crunchy treat he loves & good for him. Already order another
customer_reviews.author: MiO

customer_reviews.title: Picky dog?
customer_reviews.text: My dog used to love these things but I ordered them this time and he won’t even sniff one. Could be picky dog.
customer_reviews.author: Annenna

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: They smell just like dried fish- no surprise- so while my family moves out of range of the stink, my dog loves them and sounds like she's eating a handful of potato chips.
customer_reviews.author: melissa p

customer_reviews.title: Large package loved by all my dogs!
customer_reviews.text: The fish smell is a bit much when you first open the package but my dog loves them!!! And made in the United States!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: dog love them
customer_reviews.text: Our diabetic hound loves to chew, but crunchy snacks are hard to find. These are perfect and he gets additional nutrition as well...a good natural snack.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Too thick & hard
customer_reviews.text: My dog couldn’t chew them at all. They were too thick and hard & my dog was offended by the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Spallas

customer_reviews.title: Doggo Approves
customer_reviews.text: Our doggo can’t have any chicken product. Anyone with a poultry-intolerant doggo knows how hard it is to find treats without “chicken meal.” These are as close to whole food for doggos as a doggo treat comes. It’s basically a rolled and dehydrated salmon skin. It’s nice and crunchy. My doggo gives it 5 stars, but I give it 2 because of how it smells.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Harper

customer_reviews.title: My three dogs LOVE LOVE LOVE these treats
customer_reviews.text: I have three Schnauzers, one of which is diabetic and I have to be very careful what treats he gets. BUT they all need to get the same treat - no favorites LOL. I have bought these at the pet store once before, but the price is much better online. They are super crunchy but easy to chew and no stinky fish smell!
customer_reviews.author: Susan N Rifkin

customer_reviews.title: These are really crunchy
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of our dogs love it when I reach for this treat. I love listening to the crunching.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Fischer

customer_reviews.title: He won't touch them
customer_reviews.text: Dog hates these with a passion. He won't go near them. Hope to find someone to donate to.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: This will occupy your dog for five to fifteen minutes.
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly healthy, when it comes to snacks for dogs, and my GSD loves them. They are unique and will occupy my dog for a little while when I need a break.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Simoes

customer_reviews.title: $$ but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but you know exactly what they're made of and my dog, who turns up her nose at all the other treats, loves these.
customer_reviews.author: Puppy

customer_reviews.title: Want to put a smile on your dog's face???
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs LOVE these treats!!! They are drooling before I can get the canister opened. I discovered them at a high-end pet store in Las Vegas. Went back to buy more and they were out of stock. Checked Amazon. $2 less per unit and Prime!! Can't get better than that. I was sorry to hear about the other reviewer who's dog choked on them and had a reaction. I have a 110lb and a 30lb dog....no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. Arrived a day earlier than expected. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: broken container
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these cod skins. He jumps up and down when he sees it. It's very crunchy and clearly very satisfying for him, and my dog is picky with treats because unfortunately he is quite spoiled. I'm even getting these as Christmas presents for my friends' dogs. As a bonus, It's not smelly at all. I did once receive a broken container (see above) but amazon refunded me for it when I called them.
customer_reviews.author: Maryam Hamidi

customer_reviews.title: Dogs best treat!
customer_reviews.text: I now get these for every dog that is special to me, plus my own pup, for their birthday and Christmas present. They are stinky for a couple of minutes, but worth it. Even the so-called finicky pooch won't turn their nose up from a cod treat!
customer_reviews.author: potterfan

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes CRAZY for these and absolutely loves them! They’ll stink up your room for sure though (only when my dog eats it, in the container is fine) but it’s dried fish so what else do you expect?
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Cod Sticks
customer_reviews.text: These were just ok - I bought them because I can't find the other ones right now - I have a GSD and it took him a second to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Barter

customer_reviews.title: Stinky, not inexpensive, but organic and my pups love them
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t inexpensive, my dos love them and I think? Hope? That they are Fairly nutritious .
customer_reviews.author: Saf

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE....of potential dog allergies to product
customer_reviews.text: Company doesn't allow returns. BEWARE! My dog broke out in hives after eating this prouct.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, flavorful, single source treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. Gives her an extra crunch option. They are priced great. $3 more at our boutique pet store
customer_reviews.author: matac76

customer_reviews.title: Best heathy treat for your companion dog
customer_reviews.text: By far, my dog will do anything for these healthy. Make a nice crunch & great for their teeth. All natural.
customer_reviews.author: vie

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These cod skins are the best thing I’ve ever purchased for my dogs. I shepherd/husky mix literally never sheds anymore. He always gets compliments on how soft his fur is. My terrier used to always have itchy skin as well and after feeding them these she doesn’t itch anymore. Besides all the benefits I’ve noticed my dogs absolutely love these. They go crazy when I open the container. FIVE STARS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Puppies love it
customer_reviews.text: Our bogs had this at Cape Cod they absolutely love them I'm so happy to find them on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great treat messy but a great treat!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love them but them make a mess on the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Mina Bayer

customer_reviews.title: Good but open when received
customer_reviews.text: The products is a good item but when I received it, the cover was open even though there was 2 pieces of tape holding the cover on. It had spilled in the shipping box as well.
customer_reviews.author: Syn

customer_reviews.title: Crack for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. He simply cannot get enough of them. There are some other knock-offs that look similar, but for some reason my dog goes crazy for this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J.

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Loved This
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really love this, and if you can stand the smell of fish which is very healthy for Dogs I highly suggest you try it!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie R.

customer_reviews.title: This product is so healthy for my dog Khloe she loves these so good for her skin and coat
customer_reviews.text: I order these all the time from Amazon and get them at my local pet store. This product is so healthy for my dog Khloe she loves these so good for her skin and coat, Tons of Crude Protein, Low in fat!!!! I buy this monthly, We can not be without these. Try them just be warned THEY obviously reek like fish!
customer_reviews.author: Mariel C.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller size, same price
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats and I have been buying them from Amazon for awhile. Imagine my surprise when I paid the same amount and received a container half the size I usually get! Plus I found the large container at two pet shops near my home at the same price! I won't be buying these again from Amazin.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Okahara

customer_reviews.title: My Peyton Loves this product
customer_reviews.text: A great chewy snack, I don't give my pet bully sticks or anything like that she loves these!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Dogs ❤️❤️❤️ these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wish these cane in large packs. My dogs ❤️❤️❤️ these!! Great treat.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful treats!
customer_reviews.text: My dog eats these up so fast I have to try to slow her down! Dogs love them and though I need to store them in a cabinet because they do smell fishy, there is absolutely NO after smell. I just don't allow her to eat them in a room with carpeting. Wonderful crunchy product and all natural.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise Halpern

customer_reviews.title: Hand rolled in Boston MA.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!! My dog loves them. Super crunchy, but if you don't want to give your dog a whole skin you can break off smaller pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kim P

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love these Cod skins, it’s a nice healthy treat
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love them. But they last seconds with my collies. The cats get some also. I just cut smaller pieces off.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Horton

customer_reviews.title: Great snack full of good fish fat for our dog
customer_reviews.text: Great snack full of good fish fat for our dog. We snap them in half for our Labrador because we like to control how much she eats at one time. It only takes her a couple of seconds to finish this but she loves the fishy smell and the crunchy nature of these sticks. Smelly but doesn't linger once she has finished it.
customer_reviews.author: NYCLVR

customer_reviews.title: Puppy bounces for one!
customer_reviews.text: My little Yorkie loves these so much! He jumps up to see the clear container, then he comes to get me to give him one (half) “stick”. It’s his favorite munchie.
customer_reviews.author: Just A Note

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Our German Shepherd Dog can't get enough of it as it is a 8 PM treat, seems she can tell time on the clock.
customer_reviews.author: David Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth spoiling your 4-legged buddy
customer_reviews.text: So, although these are pricier I actually just bought the 2lb bag which is just under $60. My dog absolutely loves these treats and goes bonkers when he knows he’s going to get one.
customer_reviews.author: EKMD

customer_reviews.title: Great treats!
customer_reviews.text: Great single ingredient treat! Dogs go crazy for them. Can be broken up into smaller pieces for smaller dogs. Sounds like they’re eating potato chips when they crunch them! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: oliversees

customer_reviews.title: The dogs will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. I buy them over and over again. They're a healthy treat and I notice less skin problems when I give them to my Shih Tzu regularly. Also, you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: LOLA NJ

product_meta.title: Polkadog Bakery Cod Skins All Natural Dog Treats
product_meta.description: Size:4.7 ozThese fish sticks are off the hook! The Cod we use to make these crunchy sticks is caught in season by local fishermen on small boats from Maine to Cape Cod to Alaska. We hand-roll and slowly dehydrate each skin in our South Boston kitchen to create this savory, healthy treat.
feature_bullets: Fish-Skin Cod Dog Sticks: Give Your Canine Companion A Healthy Alternative With These Polkadog Crunchy Cod Skin Dog Sticks That Are Locally Caught In Alaska, Hand-Rolled And Dehydrated In The Usa

Healthy Dog Treats With Limited Ingredients: Fuel Your Puppy Or Senior Dog With Pet Treats That Are Packed Full Of Omega-3 Fatty Acids. Each Crunchy Cod Skin Dog Stick Is Suitable For Specific Protein Allergies And Infused With Protein, Vitamins And Fiber Your Pup Needs.

Savory, Crunchy Puppy Treats: Allow Your Furry Friend To Indulge In A Taste He Loves While You Can Feel Good About Feeding Him Dog Treats And Cod Skin Sticks That Are Crafted With Just One Ingredient.

Pet Treats You Can Share With Dogs And Cats: Even Your Feline Friends Love The Crunchy Texture And Savory Taste Of These Locally-Caught, Single Ingredient Fish-Skin Cod Sticks. Share With Your Family Of Felines And Dogs.

Dog Snacks Made In The U.S.A.: At Polkadog , We Believe In Only Using The Most Fresh And Locally-Sourced Ingredients To Bake And Prepare Healthy, All-Natural Dog Treats And Pet Snacks By Hand. All Of Our Scrumptious, Crunchy And Savory Food For Pets Are Made In The U.S.A.
